text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, this Part II of this subtitle applies to an individual who is a member of the Law Enforcement Officers' Pension System.

This Part II of this subtitle does not apply to an individual who:
is a member of the Law Enforcement Officers' Pension System;
transferred to the Law Enforcement Officers' Pension System from the Employees' Retirement System; and
did not elect to participate in the Contributory Law Enforcement Officers' Modified Pension Benefit as provided in § 26-211 of this subtitle.
